From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Cyber Claw:







Cyber Claw followed the two until---she couldn't take it anymore. She 
couldn't stand them near her forest. She slowly made her way silently to the 
edge of the forest, watching the two bot's position, causiously. She knew 
they were robots. She could smell it on them, and she could see it through 
their beast modes. No beast like those two could be living inhabitants of 
this planet.

Her breath went heavy and smooth, stalking through the forest towards the 
Fuzor and the other raptor. She kept low, with her long tail out, and her 
eyes locked on them. One could fly, but she could so could she. That would 
be no challenge. She was uncertain about the raptor. But Cyber Claw didn't 
worry too much, she was bigger than the other was. She had hunted and killed 
successfully many times. She knew how to hunt down bots as well. They were 
simple. Some didn't come with strong instincts and brains like hers.

She moved a little faster, picking up the pace. She was careful in where she 
put her two feet. She watched the fallen leaves and branches below her. She 
went ahead the two bots, moving like a shadow, then crouched and waited for 
them.

She turned her head, keeping still, blending in with her brown body colors, 
against the tree behind her. She kept her tail straight, waiting.

She watched, tense and ready to strike. She flexed her three fingers. Her 
claws were curved like daggers. Below her, on her feet were the menacing 
inner toe claws, that made her species famous. She waited until the raptor's 
side came to her front, then she leaped out, screeching wildly, throwing her 
front claws out. She tossed her head and whipped her tail.

She was a bot so much in Dinobot's appearance.
